title: Which K-pop stars are Christians? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m mostly in touch with the 2nd generation of KPop (idols who debuted from 2000 to 2010), so my answer is going to be about 2nd generation idols that I know are Christian. The most notable in my opinion: Choi Si Won from Super Junior: Often RTs Bible passages and the like. Wonder Girls’ Sunye: She was even a missionary in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, and married a Korean-Canadian missionary too, Tae Yang and Dae Sung from BIGBANG: Tae Yang especially, he’s been open about his faith since the beginning of his career. Dae Sung started attending church more frequently after his car accident in 2011. Minzy from 2NE1: Actually recently graduated from a Christian University.

upvoters.user_id: Hera Ahmed Raja حِرا احمد راجہ

response.answer_text: Great question! This is something that I'd wondered about as well, and looked up recently. 최시원 (Choi Siwon) from Super Junior is very open about being a Christian. I've watched YouTube videos where he and the other SuJu members talk about his faith.   최종훈 (Choi Jong Hoon) from FTISLAND professes to be a Christian also, but I haven't seen as much information about him.  Bonus: Not necessarily K-Pop stars, but some Korean celebrities that openly talk about the Lord and their faith are 박보검 (Park Bo Gum) and 박신혜 (Park Shin Hye).

upvoters.user_id: Jesus is Gonna Come Soon be Ready
Hera Ahmed Raja حِرا احمد راجہ

response.answer_text: In Korea, about half those who are religious are Christian (split pretty evenly between Protestant & Catholic). The other half are mainly Buddhist. In fact, a lot of Korean Christians also practice some Buddhist rites (funerals especially).So of course a lot of these young idols are going to be Catholic or Protestant (or raised as such).Fortunately I only know of ONE Idol who’s fallen into the real fundamentalist, close to cult, Protestantism that plagues MY part of the world - Park Bo Gum. Although he seems very sincere and sweet.

upvoters.user_id: Hera Ahmed Raja حِرا احمد راجہ

response.answer_text: There are quite a few, I believe Zico, HyunA, Siwon and Kyuhyun are all Christian (Catholic). Sunye formerly from Wondergirls, SNSD Tiffany, SooYoung, Hyoyeon, and Ikon Bobby. Minzy from 2ne1, Kevin formerly from Ukiss. Rain, Joshua from seventeen. Taemin, Key, Amber, and BoA. There's a lot more that I'm probably missing, but these are the one I can recall right now. (I may be mistaken, but I believe EXO is pretty much all Christian except Suho.

Hee. I just happened across this list one day when I was curious. I’d just finished watching Oh My Lady, in which Siwon, who is known to be Christian, did a cover of Who Am I (a Christian song), so I was curious as to what other people believed. Off the top of my head, I know Siwon is Christian for sure (Protestant). Kyuhyun is as well, since I remember he said he went to church in one talk show. You can read more about who believes what in this list below: Celebrity Religions

Bobby from iKon. he made it clear he was Christian.  Former member Syune from Wonder Girls. She mentions being religious and visiting church.  I also heard V from BTS was Christian and so was SEVENTEEN’s Joshua. I’m not exactly sure though. I hope this helps, even a little bit.

response.answer_text: Well, I’m not for sure, but I’ve heard alot about Rosé (blackpink) singing in a church choir as well as going to church, so I think it’s to assume that she is a Christian. I read that Dahyun and Nayeon (Twice) are protestant, and Mina and Chaeyoung are Catholic.
Rosé from blackpink is christian, she goes to church often and was part of church choirs in Australia.
